oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sharḥ Hayākil al-nūr / li-Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad al-Dawwānī : manuscript, undated
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dawwānī, Muḥammad ibn Asʻad , 1426 or 1427-1512 or 1513
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, from 18 to 19 lines per page, in black. Comments and corrections in the margins.

With this is bound: Risālat ithbāt al-wājib [al-qadīmah] / lil-Dawwānī (ff. 71r-92r) -- Risālah fī khalq al-aʻmāl [Risālah fī afʻāl al-ʻibād] / lil-Dawwānī (ff. 93r-95v) -- Risālat al-Zawrāʼ / lil-Dawwānī (ff. 99v-103r) -- Sharḥ risālat al-Ḥawrāʼ [al-Ḥawrāʼ ʻalā al-Zawrāʼ] / lil-Dawwānī (ff. 103v-111v) -- Risālah fī masāʼil / li-Ibn Sīnā (ff. 112r-113r) -- Risālah fī al-nafs / li-Ibn Sīnā (ff. 113r-115v) -- Risālah tataʻallaq bi-al-rūḥ / li-Ibn Miskawayh (f. 115v-117r).
MS Arab 137. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
